name: Dream Sketcher
description: Dream Sketcher is a 1-4 player investigative adventure game. As an investigator of the special agency Dreamland Security, you will form a team and enter the weirdest dreams to conduct brain-diving investigation. Danger is imminent, investigate, make choices, roll the dice, and fight!

name: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2
description: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 is a super fast-paced platformer with a grappling hook released for desktop on June 7th, 2023.

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 3
description: What will you eat? We have fresh cakes and delicate ice cream, juicy burgers and hearty breakfasts, dinner parties and romantic dinners for you. No need to wash your hands before the game!

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Jason's Industrial Loft
description: Step into the life of Jason, a professional trader by day and a charismatic DJ by night. In this DLC, take on the challenge of transforming his empty loft into a serene sanctuary, striking a balance between style, comfort, and functionality.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Liam & Beth's Studio Apartment
description: Assist lovebirds in designing their Studio Apartment through exciting blast puzzles. Each solution brings them closer to their cozy nest.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Mark & Mary's Master Bedroom
description: Dive into Mark & Mary's love story set in the Faroe Islands. In this DLC, guide the newlyweds through the makeover of their Master Bedroom, crafting a romantic refuge just for them.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Sheila's Modern Kitchen
description: Step into the culinary world of Michelin Star pastry chef, Sheila, in this DLC. Help redesign her kitchen into a glamorous baking haven, making every creation a delightful experience.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Steve's Sky Loft
description: Step into Steve's high-flying life in this DLC. Transform his sky-high residence to reflect his success. Design an abode that screams power, glory, and Steve's unmatched heights.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Sheila's Little Girl's Room
description: Join Sheila in making over shy Lynda's room! Transform it into the world's comfiest study sanctuary that this little homebird deserves. Let's create a delightful haven for Lynda!

name: Disk-0 Madness
description: You are a lone space-disk in an unfriendly territory, survive for as long as you can!

name: To the Dungeon!
description: Explore the depths of this massive dungeon with your adorable companion Una in this exciting deck-building adventure!

name: OMSI 2: Add-On - Man SL200
description: This add-on contains SL200 modification (VöV and StÜLB versions) equipped with naturally aspirated D2566MUH diesel engine and 3-speed automatic gearbox with retarder.

name: Blitz Football 2023
description: An American Football management sim that allows the user to build their own American Football dynasty. Build and manage a team ready for the big games, with a mix of newly drafted youth and league super legends! Apply your Playbook tactics and you'll be ready to take your franchise to the top!

name: Supervive
description: Jump, glide, shoot, punch, bounce, nuke, spike your enemies in this free-flowing, chaotic battleground in the sky. Face off in all-out, multi-squad teamfights, take down boss monsters for big loot, get that W and run it back.

name: Backdraft
description: Backdraft is a deckbuilding adventure that transports you to the magical world of Arcadia. Defy monstrous adversaries, wield the raw power of your cards, and carve out a legacy amidst a relentless battle for survival.

name: MamaShroom
description: MamaShroom is an exciting adventure-filled 2D platformer set across a variety of different lands, each rendered in beautiful pixel art. Embarking alongside Mama, you will help her reunite with her children across 40 levels in a game that will surely delight any cottagecore lover.

name: Power to Play: The Game
description:
Collect lightning bolts, fight enemies along the way, and the album art to power up. Defeat the final boss. Do you have the power to play?

A browser game promoting British pop punk band "McFly". An homage to the original Super Mario Bros. and other retro titles.

name: 8-Bit Slasher 4-in-1 Horror Demakes
description: Friday the 13th: Return to Camp Blood, Halloween: October: 31st, A Nightmare on Elm Street: Son of a Hundred Maniacs, and Candyman: Be My Victim. This is a multirom that combines all 4 games.

name: Albatroz
description: Leave your dull urban life behind and set out on a journey to find your lost brother, who disappeared while looking to reach a mythical mountain called Albatroz. Use your survival skills to traverse beautiful yet challenging landscapes, ranging from scorching coastal regions to freezing mountains. Manage your resources, strengthen your body, and improve your abilities as you face the wilderness head-on. Discover yourself as you find that the journey might actually be just as important as the destination.

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Quest for Balance
description: In Avatar: The Last Airbender - Quest for Balance you'll be playing as one of nine characters - Aang, Toph, Sokka, and Katara are all confirmed - utilizing the four elements (earth, wind, fire, and water) to solve puzzles.

name: Victory Zone: Real Pachinko Simulator
description: Victory Zone is a Miscellaneous game, developed by SCEJ and published by SCEI, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure
description: A new chapter unfolds in Guild Wars 2: Secrets of the Obscure, the fourth expansion for the award-winning MMORPG Guild Wars 2. Soar through the skies to combat the strange and otherworldly forces emerging through rifts to devastate Tyria. The adventure continues through three major story and content releases to follow. A self-contained story with its own resolution will play out at launch. Later releases will seamlessly pick up where the launch arc concluded and tell the rest of the expansion's story. Additional features and updates across the game are planned for release every quarter.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Summer Drip
description: Sin descripción

name: To a T
description: to a T is a 3D narrative adventure game developed by Keita Takahashi and the uvula team, with a strong focus on character, interaction, story and exploration. Play as a teenager (Teen), with a unique posture just trying to live a normal life in a small coastal town. Explore the town along with the help of Teen’s loyal dog and loving mother. While going to school and contending with bullies, Teen discovers a new ability granted to them by their extraordinary posture, and they start to uncover more about their mysterious lineage.

name: Wheel World
description: Dive into Wheel World as Kat, a rider chosen by ancient cycling spirits. Race elite teams, trick out your bike, and perform the long overdue Great Shift ritual to save a universe on the brink! Your bike is your destiny.

name: We Kill Monsters
description: We Kill Monsters is a solo or co-op adventure set in a mysterious and massive pit. You are a Husk of Edinu, homunculi created to explore the depths and hunt Angels.

name: Blade Runner 2033: Labyrinth
description: Set between the original film and 2049, Blade Runner 2033 takes place after the events of the Black Out and asks: what does a Blade Runner do when there are no Replicants left to hunt?

name: Laid-Back Camp All-in-one!!
description:
Familiar characters like Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in dynamic and fully-voiced dialogues. Moreover, the game is packed with over 1,000 types of camping gear and vehicles, mouth-watering camp meals, and beautiful sceneries from locations centered around Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, bringing you the world of "Laid-Back Camp".

Why don't you come and watch everyone you know camping?

name: Dusklight Manor
description: You are a young man that was offered a great opportunity for a new job and you decide to take it. You arrive at the Dusklight Manor to begin your new life and work, here you meet three wonderful girls that are under the tutelage of Mistress Clara, an enigmatic figure with more secrets than you can imagine. The girls you meet are Lizzie Monroe, Mary Best, and Lola Mod and you can build up relationships with each of them, depending on who you like more. While working around the house you notice Mistress Clara using a sort of magic on the house butler to make him younger but you set that aside, believing you are imagining things...​

name: Now & Then: A Tale of the End
description:
Now & Then is the story of Jack (or a name of your choosing) Brooks, a widower who lives with his adopted daughter, Carol, during the aftermath of a global pandemic. Throughout the story, players witness the string of events that finds Jack adopting Carol and how they grow into a family unit before the collapse of civilized society. Influenced by Stephen King’s The Stand and numerous zombie movies and books, Now & Then is a tale of survivors learning to cope with life as it comes to them.

While the present is filled with tense moments as the Brooks family struggles with the challenges of the new normal, memories of the past provide a slice-of-life window as Jack tries to learn how to be a new father to a teenage girl.

name: Hopepunk City
description:
Hopepunk City is the fourth game of the Date Ariane series at arianeb.com. It was inspired by events that happened in the United States during 2020 and 2021.

In the near future, thanks to perpetual infighting, the US Government lost it's ability to keep society stable. The land that once was the United States got divided into various mini-states, thanks to a period of conflict known as The Second Civil Wars.

The 96 governments that formed in its place, raging in size from cities to multiple former states, come in many forms: Some feudal, some neo-liberal, some communist, some tribal, and many theocratic.

You are in the now renamed District of Artema, a "solarpunk" society surrounded by less stable states.

You play as a refugee, either male or female, assigned to a household of three women, one who lost loved ones in the war, one whose family split apart by war, and one who works in the government. Getting along with your roommates is a major part of the game.

You can play as the player character from Date Ariane and Something's In The Air, or as the player character from Ariane in Paradise or play as a brand new character.

Many jobs have been automated, limiting jobs to those sectors that can’t be automated, most of which are part time. Finding a job you like is another major part of the game.

The final act involves a crisis to be averted, but only if you make the right connections and get your roommates to cooperate.

Of course this is also an erotic visual novel, with the usual amounts of satirical comedy, nudity, and sex spread throughout the narrative. As with all my games, I am constantly trying to reinvent the genre.

name: Ariane in Paradise
description:
Your character is a refugee of one of those war-torn regions who managed to swing a sponsorship to this city. You can play as a previous player character (DA/SITA or AiP) who Ariane sponsors or you can be a new character who won a sponsorship. Your character can be male or female.
You move into a house with three women: Ariane, Rachel, and Maya. The object of the game is to get a good job and become friends with all three roommates, and if you are successful you can help negotiate a plan to keep the city-state stay alive a little longer.
The game opens up in a refugee-holding area. It used to open up with long-winded exposition text until I decided “showing” is better than telling. You deal with an immigration agent in a military uniform, and then the first people you meet are people that hate refugees. The first friendly person you meet is Rachel.
Rachel gives you a tour of the house, then you meet Ariane, and depending on which origin you pick for your character, this is either a getting to know Ariane section, or a getting caught up section. There is a key point where Ariane asks what you are interested in, which is a key choice in the paths you can take.​

name: Isis: The Fall
description:
Amidst centuries-long space conflict between the Alliance of Free Planets and the Neo-Terran Confederacy, allied cruiser FSS "Isis" is sent on a mission that could turn the tides of war. However, among it's crew, there's one officer that wants to pursue his own devious plan...
Isis: The Fall is a visual novel in which you follow one man's quest for revenge. Seven powerful female crew members of "Isis" are ripe for conquest; can you bring them to fall and save your homeland from another defeat?

name: Rachel and Ariane
description:
It is Halloween and Rachel is going to a costume party a local college bar is having across the street from her off-campus condo.

She wears a sexy costume she knows at the very least would turn a few eyes her way. Hopefully, she can win the contest too.

Things don’t quite go as planned, however, as her costume turns out not to be so unique.

In anticipation of Something’s In The Air Redux coming in April, the separate purchase of the older Something’s In The Air and Rachel Meets Ariane has been discontinued. Rachel Meets Ariane will be included as a bonus in the Somethings In The Air Redux game.

name: Something's in the Air Redux
description:
Something’s In The Air Redux is a sequel to Date Ariane Remastered, but it is designed to be a stand-alone game.

In part, a remastering of the original Something’s In The Air (2013), but with a streamlined story and playable as either a straight male or gay female character each with slightly different content.

name: Numb: Just Don't Think About It
description: Numb - Just Don't Think About It plunges you into an unsettling 2D horror experience where your sanity is your only lifeline.

name: MLB Rivals
description:
Take your rivalries to the next level in MLB Rivals!

A new officially licensed MLB mobile game with the latest rosters and schedules!
Enjoy an MLB mobile game with improved graphics!
Dive into MLB 9 INNINGS RIVALS for a brand new gameplay experience.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel - Special Edition
description:
Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel, also known as Neon Genesis Evangelion: Iron Maiden, is a video game based on the Gainax anime/manga series Neon Genesis Evangelion.

The PS2 and PSP edition adds new scenarios, gallery and replay mode and an auto-save function.

name: Kawanakajima Ibunroku
description: Sin descripción

name: Over OBJ
description: Homebrew SHMUP game that tries to deliver huge amount of objects on screen at the same time.

name: Hazuki Makimura's Love Story
description: Hazuki Makimura's Love Story is the Nintendo Switch port of the 2021 romantic visual novel where after a series of misfortunes, with the protagonist, Kayabuki Akira, being trapped after a tree fell into his apartment and the wall connecting his temporary apartment room to his neighbor's collapses, he's now forced to live with his neighbor, Makimura Hazuki, and deal with living together and getting to know each other better.

name: Private Lesson with My Lover Teacher
description: Private Lesson with My Lover Teacher is an erotic visual novel where the teacher, Tsukimori Misaki, suddenly decides to live with his student, Kido Yusuke, who doesn't know what to do in the future and tries to give him some help.

name: Ningyou no Kizuato
description:
It is the end of the year in December.
Asumi has lost complete contact with her elder sister who goes to a graduate school in Tokyo.
Worried for her sister's safety, Asumi travels alone to Tokyo to find her–
but no trace of her could be found. Her sister wasn't in the laboratory where she had been assigned to, nor at her apartment.
Asumi is at loss as for what to do…
What has happened to her sister…?

Asumi is determined to find out.
What she doesn't know, however, is that she is in imminent danger…
and there are frightening facts awaiting her.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Contents Kit
description:
The Ultimate Edition Content Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Special Colors. All included content is exclusive to this package.
The physical Ultimate Edition release came with a single-use code for this content.

The Ultimate Edition Special Colors include the 5 characters in Season Pass 1 along with the 15 in the initial roster. The 4 characters added in Season Pass 2 get this color variation as part of Additional Color Pack 2.

The soundtrack includes a total of 55 songs, featuring more than 15 vocal themes and 40 background tracks used in the Story Mode.

The Artwork includes various art and visuals from the Guilty Gear series’ history including the main visuals of each game and a number of unreleased illustrations from renowned guest artists.

name: Hollow Cocoon
description: "Trapped in a cocoon, the silkworm weaves her final dream." Hollow Cocoon is a first-person horror adventure game set in 1980s Japan. Immerse yourself in meticulously recreated environments as you venture into the depths of unspeakable horrors that await you.

name: Maid for Loving You
description: Average guy Yuuma suddenly finds his boring life becoming way more exciting when he encounters a mysterious woman named Eve. Join him as he discovers the joys of having a live-in maid in this heartwarming visual novel.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition 2022
description:
Ultimate Edition 2022 includes the base game (Guilty Gear -Strive-), Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2 and the Ultimate Edition Contents Kit.
Early purchasers of the Xbox releases, from release till April 13th, also got the exclusive Special Colors for Sol and Ky.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.

Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and the Additional Character Color Pack 2 which adds 6 color variations for the 4 characters added in Season Pass 2.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1.
A color variant in Additional Character Color Pack 2 matches the Ultimate Edition Special Colors for Season Pass 2 characters.

Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Project D
description:
“For this game, we used the works of Rutger Bregman and Yuval Noah Harari as reference for thinking about humanity in the future,” co-founder and artist Hiroco Shiino said in a video featurette. “The game takes place in a future that could really happen. It’s about daily life in a place called Rakuen (paradise). I think the problems presented in this game will be very familiar to us in the real world.”

Co-founder and programmer Akira Mitsuhashi added, “This title was Hiroco’s idea, so Hiroco is the key person for this project. And I listen to Hiroco whenever she has questions, and we come up with a vairety of ideas together.”

name: Legend of Empress
description:
Aesthetic love in ancient China, gorgeous clothing, and cruel infighting in the imperial harem. Drama happens every day!
Love, Lies, and Reign. Forbidden Love in the harem, can you stay true to your heart after all the sufferings?

name: Rise of Queendom
description: Royal Life Simulation Game.

name: Promise of Lingyun
description: Promise of Lingyun is an archaistic role-playing game featuring hand-drawn Chinese ink painting style. Play as the main character to work for the welfare of the country and people in a mysterious palace of millenniums ago. The larger gameplay variety and random explorations overwhelms players with the love and hatred intertwined in the palace.

name: Sugar Bear
description: Sugar Bear is a fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled adventure where speed is your ally and the forest is your playground. Collect Sugar, unleash speed, and own the forest in this fast-paced adventure. Can you reign supreme?

name: BabyRace
description: 《Baby Race》is a multiplayer casual game. Players will compete with other players on the same stage, competing in various modes such as parkour, survival, racing, and bomber etc. Eventually, they will continue to compete in rounds of battles until only one player is left to win the game.

name: Fly Fly Dragon!
description: Embark on an epic adventure as a mighty dragon in "Fly Fly Dragon!"

name: Kill Crab
description: Kill Crab is an underwater First Person Shooter, where you must complete combat challenges by killing aquatic vermin. The player will have to complete 4 combat challenges to escape. The game's theme is a combination of the wild west and underwater.

name: Goddess Detective 2
description: A newly married couple suddenly lost their engagement ring, according to the hostess. That day she went out to buy food, only out for ten minutes. When I came back, the ring was gone, but of course it was later discovered. But she hasn't been out since.

name: Shire Scopes
description: A multiplayer arena shooter with sniper-muskets, swords, and fluid movement mechanics. Climb the leaderboards!

name: Mini Ranger
description: Play as a space ranger, who has been tasked to defeat the evil Techno Dragons, who have inhabited an old planet in the hopes that they can get to controlling the world! Stop them, Ranger, before the dragon's plan comes to completion!

name: Flower Flurry
description: In this sweet and challenging 2D platformer, collect flowers as fast as you can while avoiding bees, wasps and spikes in a series of 40 randomly generated levels.

name: Vulture: Unlimited Frontier - 0
description: This is an action game in which the player builds and controls a giant robot. The game features ground crawling 3D maneuvers, customizable elements, picturesque characters, and scenarios. Even those who have never been good at action games will surely find that Vulture will respond to their needs.

name: Unstoppable
description: The first series of ‘Unstoppable' is a mystery survival game that takes place in the ‘Everway Investment' conducting secret research. Find an antidote, avoid the infected, and uncover hidden stories. Are you ready to escape?

name: Furni-Jumpin'
description: Watch out for those furniture! Furni-Jumpin' is a 2D platformer arcade game where you take control of a weird little creature dodging enemies and collecting items while jumping on furniture.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Antarctica
description: Where penguins spend their winter holidays This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Antactica. - One roller coaster cart.

name: Typhon: Bot vs. Bot
description: Typhon: BvB is an online multiplayer game that takes place in a future world where players take on the role of pilots, people whose job is to program bots to fulfill a variety of missions. From resource gathering to combat, and more.

name: Touhou Healing Nature
description:
A newly born plant youkai, Ha Seoi, learns to survive in Gensokyo. But soon, plants in her hometown started withering.
Shocked, Ha resolves to heal them; her sister sends her on a quest to Hakurei Shrine to ask the Miko of Paradise for help,
but they are soon attacked by youkai that have been driven insane.
Thus begins an adventure through Gensokyo that has our heroines (and one hero) caught in an ever-growing crisis...

name: Burn Them
description: Burn Them - A top-down game where the player, using a flashlight of his choice, burns monsters and collects different items from chests to help him in a strange and gloomy world of different labirint-shaped corridors, as if the hero was in his scariest nightmare.

name: Chickenality
description: Chickenality - A top-down game, you control a chicken in an arena where enemies appear, in each level you find yourself with a unique weapon, ammo, health packs and explosive barrels. Challenge yourself to last as long as possible.

name: Planetgore
description: A sci-fi horror roguelite where you use advanced-tech weapons to defend yourself against a horde of deadly aliens on a dangerous planet. Choose from diverse power-ups, weapons, and characters to survive and unveil the mysteries of the alien world.

name: QuizFizz
description: Do you really know your friends or would you like to get to know them?

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle 2
description: Sharlie, the feline shop clerk in-training, and Lulu, the chaos-loving poltergeist, are here! This DLC contains the following: • Sharlie • Coffin Lantern • Lulu

name: Ultimate Front
description: In Ultimate Front step into the role of an archer and defend or conquer a castle in a team. Battle on two unique maps against various enemies using your bow and unlimited arrows in a VR environment. Play with up to 4 players in VR arcades and compete in individually configurable leaderboards.

name: Magic Trap
description: Magic Trap is the best game in which your attentiveness and dexterity will be perfectly trained. Collect at least five crystals of the same color and attack the monsters. Don't forget to dodge pseudo crystals with spiky edges.

name: Pandora
description: Pandora brings a mix of the moba genre with soul mechanics, destroy towers and fight different enemies with an innovative playstyle, use mounts and pets to help you during your gameplay.

name: Octopus Trouble
description: Octopus Trouble - A game with a top view, you control an octopus that fights off sea enemies by shooting bubbles and collecting fish eggs, which gives him strength and the ability to live to the end.

name: Clickart
description: Click Art is a clicker with a side view, where the player clicks monsters, buys improvements, pumping up monster destruction as well as click damage levels, progressing through new levels and discovering new worlds and types of monsters.

name: Fight For Your Resurrection VR
description: Fight For Your Resurrection is a fighting game with dynamic A.I., gamepad support. When You loose a match the difficult level decrease! When You win consecutively two matches the difficult level increase! I dare You to finish the game never losing a match!

name: Burning Calories
description: Burning Calories is a side view runner in which you have to run away from a huge bun. Food delivery men are running to meet you and huge hot dogs are lying around. Jump over them or shoot them with a pistol. By the end of the day, you will lose quite a few pounds!

name: Shardpunk: Verminfall - Rat Pack
description: Leah, the Electromancer joins the Shardpunk roster and brings shock and awe to the ratty faces of her enemies. Her electrifying powers will come in handy during encounters with brand new enemy units - Stun Lancers and Elite variants of Shardpunk's vermin.

name: The Wand Wizard
description: Create insane combinations of power and break the game in every possible way to get your name on the leaderboards! Each round you evolve but the enemies increase...

name: Max's Tales
description: An action platform game which an evil Wizard and his henchmen try to take over the world using an ancient prophecy. Defeat them with the help of special powers, overcome obstacles, face cunning enemies and become the Hero who brought peace to the world.

name: Ravenbound: Hammers of Ávalt
description: The Hammers of Ávalt DLC introduces the new hammer weapon archetype to Ravenbound. This pack adds hammer cards with unique stats and effects that you can collect and equip while exploring Ávalt, to help you on your journey towards defeating the Betrayer.

name: Trail Out: Legendary Cars
description: A collection of three iconic vehicles popularised through video games and movies.

name: Everdream Valley: Summer Fun DLC
description: Set up your perfect outdoor gathering!

name: For Double
description: For Double is a side-view game where the player controls rectangular figures, dodging dangerous figures, jumping on platforms that randomly change and move, the game has the possibility of a competitive game for two.

name: Hotline Omsk
description: Hotline Omsk - 2D Top-Down shooter where you play as a brutal bandit whos only goal is to terminate other bandits for the sake of survival. Expect dynamic and hardcore shootouts in the narrow-spaced interiors of multi-storey panel buildings, with just one attempt to escape without taking any damage.

name: GasCraft
description: This is a casual gasoline battle game where players need to control a small car to increase points by collecting gasoline on the map, while also paying attention to avoiding bombs chasing around.

name: Forklift Simulator 2023
description: Start your job in this realistic forklift simulator. Experience realistic controls, intricate maneuvering, and precise cargo handling. Complete missions, master different forklift models, and prove your skills in this immersive simulation game.

name: Ducks Can Drive
description: Ducks like to race, even in their own cars! Earn money by delivering food to fellow ducks in the city, then use this money to upgrade your vehicle. The better the vehicle, the better chance you have to win the race at the end of the day!

name: Sea Rivals VR
description: Raise the periscope! Get ready for intense naval battles, captains: torpedo your rivals, dodge your adversary's attacks, and dominate the sea.

name: Felonian Special Forces
description: A sci-fi 3d shooter game set on the planet of Felonia. Command units to defend friendly facilities and attack enemy facilities. Fight on foot and also using vehicles.

name: Into The Flames: Retro Truck Pack 1
description: Cruise to fire scenes in style! This pack includes 2 unique fire trucks inspired by some of America's most iconic trucks.

name: Pikki Rikki
description: A bun-tastic game for the Playdate!

name: Eleventh: Unsacred
description: the last of the last eleven: the director, another seven

name: Castle Tintagel
description: Embark on a epic quest of revenge in this nostalgic retro action platformer. Exclusively built for the playdate. Play as Gawain, the last remaining knight of the round table and fight your way through the evil that Morgana has unleashed onto this world. Take down epic bosses with the aid of Merlin and Gwenevere in the fight to reclaim Tintagel Castle from the evil Sorceress Morgana.

name: Wild Leopard Safari
description: A Furious and young leopard exist in medieval forest and for survival he has to face many wild animals because the only way is to fight them.Play animal family simulator games in 2019 and discover the life of young leopard with his clan in wild adventure forest and not just this greeny forest you can also stray in Snowy Forest by discovering it with your wilderness skills.

name: Blocky Fills
description:
Great, fulfilling time waster: Fill the board with the same colour before you run out of moves.
Gameplay: tap one of the color buttons at the bottom of the screen to fill all neighbours with the same color. Once you do that with the whole board, you win.

name: Solitaire Dash
description:
Feel the rush of Solitaire on steroids! Presenting - Solitaire Dash!
Help King Sol match the falling cards with Solitaire rules! If you know how to play Solitaire and want a quick game, Solitaire Dash is for you! Keep your eyes out on the falling cards and match the appropriately!

name: Illusion Squares
description: Illusion is image based minimalistic puzzle game. Just rotating pieces for solve coded image. This game is the perfect for jigsaw lovers. Best choice for relaxing and fun with your family.

name: Touch to Fate: Occult Romance
description:
"I can see his memory when I touch him! I should steal memories if I want the truth..!"

In 'Touch to Fate', you should uncover the hidden truths of Devon Island University!
The ending of the story depends on your choices...

When you touch someone, the curse is triggered!
You can see the other people's memories.

At Devon Island University, only the top 1% of the elite attend, there are clues related to 'your' parents' deaths! Discover the despicable secrets and hidden truths here.

name: Swing Robot
description: Tap to change direction and swing the robot,don't touch metal pieces.

name: BMX Backflip King
description:
BMX Backflip King.
Easy to play, but hard to master.
This bmx kid loves back flipping, though he's not to good at it.
Help him to land his backflips by tapping the screen to rotate.
Land level with the ramp to keep his speed up.
More speed bigger air. bigger air, more points.
Collect Cash to unlock a new track.

name: Blitz Racer
description: Blitz Racer 2.0 has the same sleek isometric design, unique controls, and challenging gameplay that you love, but with tons of new tracks and tunes to experience. This version features a retooled difficulty arc and the ability to collect lives to resume your game, prolonging the Blitz Racer experience.

name: Drive Cars: Avoid Traffic
description:
A new gameplay just launched!
Drive your favorite car and avoid traffic!
Get your best distance and share with your friends !
A great isometric city build for you!

name: Road to Valor: World War II
description:
Road to Valor: World War II is a real-time PVP strategy game where you can compete with global players around the world as a General of World War II, the biggest war in history.
Select “Command” that suits your own strategy style and collect various units to build the strongest troops. Fight against swarms of enemies in the realistically presented battlefield. Destroy enemy Headquarter and bunkers to get medals as well as the most glorious victory!

name: Guardian Goddess
description: We are recruiting gamers from the World Government! Control an immortal Guardian to destroy enemies and grow indefinitely!

name: Rocket Lift
description: Dodge the asteroids to fly further and score higher score then before.

name: On Air Island
description:
'On Air Island' is set on a mysterious 'remote island' that is full of intrigue.
It tells the mysterious and horrifying story of the main characters trapped on a remote island.

You are the audience, but you are also the ones who can save or kill the characters as they run for their lives from the dangers that abound on the deserted island.
Will the cast be able to escape the island's labyrinth that is closing in on them and survive?

name: 8-Bit Rebellion!
description: 8-Bit Rebellion! was a mobile app developed by Artificial Life, Inc. featuring the American rock band Linkin Park. It featured retro inspired graphics and beat 'em up gameplay, as well as social connectivity including message boards, private messages, and customizable apartments that other players could visit. Completion of the game rewarded an unreleased song which at the time was exclusive to the game.

name: A Chinese Ghost Story 2023
description: This game tells a touching love story. Ning Caichen is an scholar. On his way to Guobei County to collect accounts, he encountered heavy rain and had to hide in Lanruo Temple. In the temple, he met a pretty ghost named Nie Xiaoqian. later, they fell in love with each other, and the story unfolded...

name: Wyrmicide
description: There may only be one true Wyrm King and you're tasked in ensuring his succession! Engage in an exciting blend of turn-based tactics and real time 1v1 duels as you Stab, Shoot, Magic and Fireball your way to Victory!

name: Offroad Truck 4x4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game
description: Gear up for the ultimate offroad experience in "Offroad Truck 4X4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game"! Embark on a thrilling adventure across two distinct locations, the scorching Desert and the untamed Woodland.

name: Pirates: The Legend of the Kraken
description: Can you defeat the fearsome Kraken? A fascinating game of choices where you are the key. Recruit your crew, track the Kraken and defeat it. The fate of the sea depends on you.

name: Arcade Archives: Cop 01
description:
"COP 01" is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1985.
Players take control of rookie detective James with Police Precinct 1, infiltrate the secretive Specter organization's hidden base, and rescue their kidnapped partner Stacy as the goal.
Fight your way through the countless enemies in the hidden base using both your normal jump and the higher "Rocket Jump" performed using a limited gauge!

name: Contraptions 3
description: Contraptions 3 is a physics based puzzle game with a fun cartoony look and feel to it.

name: Family Jigsaw Puzzle: Classic Mosaic Puzzles
description: A classic mind puzzle in which you have to completely fill the playing field with shapes of different shapes.

name: Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles
description:
Champions Tactics Grimoria Chronicles is a brand new PVP Tactical RPG experimental game on PC published by Ubisoft utilizing Oasys Blockchain and NFT elements. Assemble a team of mythical Champions, engage in thrilling tactical battles against other players and discover the legends of the dark and mystical world of Grimoria.

Are you ready to write your name in the chronicles?
Follow us on our social networks and subscribe to our newsletter to stay in touch with the latest news.

name: Islands Might Fly
description: ISLANDS MIGHT FLY is a tycoon and strategy hybrid game about recreating historical periods on an interplanetary station rotating somewhere in space. Manage staff and accommodate customers. Help to create dreams of the future to relive the past. You are now in charge of a giant cylinder.

name: The Card Perfect Collection Plus: Texas Hold 'em, Solitaire and Others
description: An all-in-one collection for all your card game needs! Whether it's solitaire or competitive online games like Daifugo or Blackjack you're after, this is the game for you!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Marine Forces Outfits Pack
description: Customize your agent like a Marine Forces soldier with this armed force themed pack. Four unique camouflaged-patterned outfits.

name: Sin(e)s
description: Interactive experience that simulates the aftermath of catastrophic earthquakes.

name: LEGO 2K Drive: Year 1 Drive Pass
description: Purchase the Premium versions of each Season to earn even more rewards as you play through each Season or Purchase the Year 1 Drive Pass to get the Premium versions of Seasons 1-4. Season rewards include Vehicles, Drivers, Stickers, Flairs, Sounds, Brick Packs, and more! The Year 1 Drive Pass also includes the Awesome Pizza Vehicle and 550 Coins you can use in Unkie's Emporium.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Touhou Project Pack 01
description:
Sixtar Gate : STARTRAIL – Touhou Project 01
Meet the first Touhou Project DLC of Sixtar Gate: Startrail!
This DLC contains 11 new songs and a new original theme.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Chrono Circle + Music Diver Pack
description: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "Chrono Circle" and "Music Diver"!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Premium Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: House Flipper: Mega Pack
description: Discover Endless Garden Possibilities and Find Your Perfect Pet Companions in this version of the game with all available DLCs!

name: House Flipper: Pets Bundle
description: Experience House Flipper with addition of Pet Companions!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following:
- Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening
- Digital Officer Artbook
- Digital 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book
- Digital Complete Soundtrack
- Exclusive Scenario "Muskets Arrive"
- 40th Anniversary "Officer Face Graphics and Additional Traits" (six each)

name: The Medium: Cloud Version
description: The Medium: Cloud Version arrives on Nintendo Switch, meaning Switch gamers can get in on a game that was said to only be viable via the latest technology.

name: I.Game Hong Kong Mahjong
description:
Looking for someone to play with? Join us for an exciting game of 13 Mahjong!

Now you can play Hong Kong Mahjong on Nintendo Switch, accompanied by authentic Cantonese voice, providing you with the most realistic gaming experience!

name: Hentai World: Premium Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose, and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Mana Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 1
description:
Tribe skins are basically costumes for the tribe that will change an entire tribe's aesthetic from the ground up! New clothes, new buildings, new music, and sometimes even new animals! The Skins are also visible in multiplayer mode and the AI opponents will also use the skins.

Skin pack 1 includes the following skins:
- Bardur Baergøff
- Hoodrick Yorthwober
- Vengir Cultist

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 2
description:
Skin pack 2 includes the following skins:
- Imperius Lirepacci
- Xin-Xi Sha-po
- Luxidoor Aumux

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 3
description:
Skin pack 3 includes the following skins:
- Oumaji Khondor
- Kickoo Ragoo
- Zebasi Anzala

name: Sonic Frontiers x Monster Hunter Pack
description: Get some stylish in-game Monster Hunter equipment and play a fun mini-game!

name: Hoverkitty in The Hoververse: Chapter Two
description: Hoverkitty is back, and she needs help. Help Hoverkitty as she goes on a epic adventure, where the choices she makes lead her on a journey that could save, or destroy, the Hoververse.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Season Pass
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Season Pass includes access to even more AEW wrestlers and over-the-top minigames including:
- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack

name: Gangster Coin Pusher
description: A gangster-themed spoof coin pushing game Unique strategy to push coins, control coin drops, activate your jackpot! Run a community and upgrade your weapons. Defeat bosses to win rewards

name: Luyen Nguc
description: Luyện Ngục consists of a total of 26 floors, divided into 5 areas: Ruins, Green Forest, Cave, Desert, and Deathland. Each area has its own story, unique space, and different (cute) monsters.

name: Fishgun
description: Fishgun is a chaotic fish-person shooter where you feed your sentient gun random upgrades to defeat hordes of evil fruit.

name: Heart of Iona
description: The Heart of Iona is Narrative Game where choices shape the story. During Ella's coronation, the castle is attacked, leading her to a secret chamber with a trapped dragon. Freeing him sets off a chain of adventures, as Ella learns the power of her heart to alter the Kingdom of Iona's destiny.

name: Team Six
description: A squad-based strategic action game where you command six types of special units to complete missions. It offers a variety of gameplay options, including large-scale battles, infiltration, sniping, and armored warfare.

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Curse of the Puppet Master Skin Pack
description:
You'll take part in Dr.Mcgrew's freakish experiments when you purchase the Curse of the Puppet Master skin pack for Puppet Master: The Game!

Includes skins and emotes based on the Sixth Puppet Master film, Curse of the Puppet Master.

name: Midnight Dreams
description: In Midnight Dreams, embark on a psychological horror adventure, playing as Felipe, a boy with a unique perspective. Trapped in a space station on the brink of destruction, overcome dark obstacles, unravel secrets, and join Felipe's quest for truth, freedom, and forgiveness.

name: Renegade
description: Sega Master System port of Renegade.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Hermes: The Fury of Megaera
description: An ancient rivalry resurfaces. Megaera, a vengeful being with a dark past, found solace in her ominous lair, surrounded by suffering and horror. Fuelled by resentment and a thirst for power, she set her sights on Aphrodite, the embodiment of beauty.

name: SuperKraft
description: Welcome to "SuperKraft," an immersive 3D survival crafting game! Explore stunning landscapes, hunt animals, and craft powerful tools. Encounter creatures, battle foes, and earn legendary rewards!

name: Clear the Train
description: While cleaning the train, you can use a gun or a shotgun, if you don't want to use bullets, you can use your katana. Kill the zombies that damage you by exploding both from a close and a distance and try to pass the wagon as much as possible.

name: FPV Logic
description: FPV Logic is an FPV drone simulator with near-real physics and operation experience. Whether you enjoy freestyle or racing, you can find the same fun as flying a real drone in this game.

name: Demon Dodger
description: Demon Dodger is an all-ages, heckin' good time! Navigate a rain of demons without falling to waste alongside them. Dodge the cons of a magical fairyland, and make sure not to be caught while lurking amid the remnants of an experimental disaster.

name: FireRun
description: "FireRun" offers a thrilling 2D adventure in an ordinary 3D world. Break through obstacles, survive, and showcase your sprinting skills. Prepare for heart-pounding challenges and unleash your courage in this exhilarating game!

name: Star Keeper
description: Curious why gamers in the 80s were so addicted to NES games? Star Keeper will take you on a journey to experience the joy of staying up all night to beat this NES game!

name: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-Stravaganza
description: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-stravaganza is an homage to the classic Point & Click Adventure games. It's a comedy induced fantasy game, where you follow our protagonist Bongus Bright-Eye on his journey to save the Dwarven Kingdom.

name: Coloring Pixels: Transport Pack
description: This Transport-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Trains, Planes and Motor Vehicles! Put your seat belt on and color how we can traverse the world!

name: Dark Past Darker Future
description: Step into the grim and dystopian world of "Dark Past Darker Future," an intense single-player arena shooter that will push your skills to the limit. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled FPS experience.

name: Cotton Tale
description: Cotton Tale is a deceptively difficult precision platformer. Hopping is the name of the game. Each jump is precarious and getting to the top will take everything you've got. The journey may be long, and your falls may be great, but remember... failure is part of the fun!

name: Cleanup Project
description: A 3D exploration game, where your goal is to clean up your neighborhood. But litter on the sidewalk isn't the only problem you'll need to solve.

name: Fatum Betula + Moto Rush GT
description:
Unleash the thrill of discovery and speed with our must-have gaming bundle: Moto Rush GT + Fatum Betula!

• Dive into the enigmatic world of Fatum Betula, an atmospheric exploration game that transports you to a reality without a past. Nurture a mystical birch that shapes the future, decipher light puzzle elements, and strive to achieve one of the 10 unique endings.

• Hit the road with Moto Rush GT, the high-octane motorbike racing experience. Select from a plethora of customizable motorbikes and race your way through over 100 levels of adrenaline-fueled excitement. The road rules are yours to break in this exhilarating mix of endless and arcade racing.

Don't miss out on this dynamic duo of mystique and action. Get the bundle now and supercharge your gaming adventure!

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER (full game)
• Season Pass 1
• Season Pass 2
• Season Pass 3
• Season Pass 4

The Naruto franchise is back with a brand new experience in NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER! This new game lets gamers battle as a team of 4 to compete against other teams online! Graphically, SHINOBI STRIKER is also built from the ground up in a completely new graphic style. Lead your team and fight online to see who the best ninjas are!

name: Faster Racer Boom Boom
description: Ultimate contest of wreckage and devastation, Faster Racer Boom! Boom! pits players against each other in various arenas, using their vehicles to destroy their opponents and complete numerous objectives!

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Ultimate Supporter Edition
description:
Unlock everything ever made for Doom & Destiny Worlds!Are you nerd enough to fully support Doom & Destiny Worlds and the dweebs who made it?

Doom & Destiny Ultimate Supporter Edition Bundle features:
- Doom & Destiny Worlds, the game, of course,
- the Season Pass, and never miss all the upcoming DLCs,
- the Deluxe Content.

name: Mana Sisters
description: Mana Sisters is a captivating 2D puzzle game. Match cards to unveil a magical world of diverse spellcasters, challenging your memory as you enjoy soothing sounds and one-handed gameplay.

name: Renegade
description: Home computer port of Renegade.

name: Beast Blasters
description: Play as the Beast Blasters themselves to go ahead and blast the beast and have a feast!

name: Hidden Village Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Ricky's Furry Duck Hunt
description: Join Ricky as he hunts some ...peculiar... looking ducks in this arcade-style point-and-click game.

name: Dual Chroma
description: Journey alongside the Second Prince of the Galens Empire to unlock ancient secrets in this romantic fantasy adventure visual novel with a dark twist. With multiple endings and immersive battle sequences, will you write your own destiny, or repeat the mistakes of those whom history has forgotten?

name: Summer Valley Hike
description: Embark on a soul-soothing journey through the captivating Summer Valley. Leave your worries behind and let the beauty of this peaceful world envelop you. Summer Valley Hike is your ticket to a serene escape from the chaos of everyday life.

name: Fortnite: Transformers Pack
description:
Roll out, Rise up, or Beep Beep with the Fortnite Transformers Pack! Physical copies of this Pack will roll out at retail starting October 13, and digital copies will be available in digital stores starting October 21.

This new Pack includes:
- 3 New Outfits
- 3 New Back Blings
- 3 New Pickaxes
- 2 New Emotes
- 1,000 V-Bucks

name: Sassy Cybergirl
description: Immerse yourself in a world filled with stunning cyber-girls, dazzling graphics and relaxing music.

name: The Customer is Always Right!
description: Go on adventures as you take on a modern world in an old-school style puzzle RPG about being a cashier! ... Or so it would seem!

name: Floral Gate: The secret of sexual practices
description: Improve your xxx life quality and add more spice to your xxxlife. There are games for two players as a couple.

name: Escape Shadow Storm
description: Escape Shadow Storm is a story-oriented pirate themed set of escape rooms. Each room requires the completion of a bamboozling puzzle to progress. Players will encounter a series of interesting hidden items, hazy riddles, and unpickable locks. Experience the magical story and swashbuckling adventure.

name: Soulsland 3: Spider Invasion
description: After old enemies defeated, new enemy raised, Evil Giant Spider and his army has captured souls to bottle. World needs again Lord Barbarus and his skills

name: Nightsteel Survivors
description: Nightsteel Survivors is a 2D shooter with "roguelite" elements set in a dangerous robot-filled laboratory. Choose from various characters with unique abilities and face challenging bosses. Upgrade your skills and equipment to survive and escape the Nightsteel labyrinth.

name: Multiplayer Mercs
description: Multiplayer Mercs - Bad Dudes are attacking the Refinery, it is up to You and Your Elite Force Team to Stop Them !

name: Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos
description: "Unleash your inner rebel in 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos', an 80s-90s arcade-style game set in Milwaukee's punk scene. Fight through 13 levels at iconic venues, aided by lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's music. Battle enemies, assist friends, and claim your punk icon status.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Make the Difference
description: Don't let your dreams be dreams. You CAN make a difference! A board game where you make a "Spot the Difference".

name: Next Station: Zombies
description: "Next Station: Zombies" is an indie-casual game that throws you into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of ravenous zombies.

name: Cute Hentai Waifu: Numbers
description: 2048 puzzle game with relaxing music, and cute waifus.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Furries
description: Poly Jigsaw: Furries is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute furry.

name: Sokoban 3D
description: Move the cubes to their correct locations and solve the levels.

name: Leafy Trails
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the mesmerizing world of Leafy Trail, where silence speaks volumes and nature tells its own story.

name: HongKong Noir
description: This is a Hong Kong noir action game from the 1980s.

name: AntarticaRoyale
description: This DLC adds the entire continent of Antarctica to the game along with new events, province types and more!

name: Vapor dash
description: Vapor Dash: Hardcore action platformer set in a vaporwave city. Stay in constant motion, make quick decisions, defeat enemies, and escape. Fast-paced, challenging gameplay.

name: My Lovely Pets 2: Collector's Edition
description: "My lovely Pets 2" is an exciting game, which offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games. Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.

name: Quantum Rail
description: Quantum Rail is a thrilling, fast-paced first-person shooter that takes you on an exciting adventure through a sci-fi-themed wild west world.

name: Death Slayer
description: Death Slayer is a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer where you control Asura, a young swordswoman whose goal is to eradicate the evil that plagues her land.

name: Future Offline
description: Future Offline is an Oldschool single player RPG. It simulates a MMORPG and many mechanics are based around a MMO design. This game may primarily appeal to those looking for nostalgia of old MMOs or RPGs from the early 2000s or before.

name: Tempo Mayhem
description: Shoot, punch, and cast to the enemies beat. Survive chaotic and dynamic tempo driven rounds. Dash to keep within tempo range or dash to avoid incoming damage.

name: IMPULSE
description: IMPULSE is the next generation of carball. Game play simplicity provides for high-speed, competitive matches. Single player and multiplayer in a Classic game mode or in our new Us & Them game mode. Complete with an AI-powered bot named Vicky. Welcome to IMPULSE.

name: Hitler Waifu
description: Hitler Waifu is a 3rd person shooter where you play as an anime girl, once on an island, you need to collect things from various places and not die from evil soldiers.

name: Dream Of a Square
description: Dream Of A Square, Start Your Square Adventure Get to the final stage with countless falling squares If you make a mistake, you'll regret it endlessly

name: Trolley
description: A multi-ending 2D action RPG set in an MMORPG world. A story of decisions made by a reclusive protagonist and the mysterious in-game NPC!

name: Astrality
description: After a training simulation gone wrong, a bounty hunter embarks on a journey to find treasures and adventure.

name: Neon Fantasy: Boys
description: Neon Fantasy: Boys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Shattered Legacy
description: Start an exciting journey through a magical world, where the familiar idea of nudging blocks and solving puzzles combine to offer an amazing adventure puzzle game. Discover a magical world. Explore difficult puzzles and cryptic challenges in unique levels.

name: Adamgelion
description: Adamgelion: An action shooter where you're a young sorceress fighting dark forces. Destroy enemies with fireballs and lightning, conquer 20 levels, and save the world. Diverse enemies, arena-style gameplay, and randomly generated levels for endless fun.

name: Manabaz
description: Minimalist Arena Brawler - play against neural network controlled bots

name: Hotspace station
description: Hotspace Station is a fast-paced action arcade game where you use a grappling hook to navigate and defeat enemies. With unique mechanics, various weapons, and pixel graphics, it offers thrilling gameplay across multiple levels.

name: Path to Knighthood
description: Learn the dark truth behind a gentle wyvern's rampage, a cold-blooded murder, and a dragon-worshiping cult. Will you submit or defy the godlike creature?

name: Forest Phantoms
description: Forest Phantoms is an addictive horror-survival game in which players beat back the spirits of the forest to keep their fires burning and survive as long as possible.

name: Driving Strikers
description: Driving Strikers is a 2.5D car football extravaganza in a 90s-style! Play 4-player matches across 5 different stadiums with wildly different and beautiful environments!

name: Billy in Bubble Trouble
description: Billy is a Florbz and the favourite pet of Space Princess Leila. He is a happy little critter as he gets snacks regularly and the occasional tummy rub to ensure he feels like he is in Paradise. But one day he woke up and his food bowl was empty.... no snacks.... and no tummy rubbing anymore! Why?

name: Finish Report
description: Finish Report is a short science fiction horror game. All communications have been lost to a space station far in deep space. You as a one-man investigation unit has been sent to find out why did the station go silent.

name: New York Mysteries: Power of Art
description: Laura is on a new mission to discover the history of the mysterious fantasy-world paintings, unaware of the monstrous plan behind this evenings mystical events. She can't handle such a difficult mission alone!

name: Demon Hunter
description: Defeat demons to improve your stats and feel the speed of combat

name: Renegade
description: DOS port of Renegade.

name: Sky Is Arrows: Celestial Bow Item Chest
description: This DLC introduces 20 captivating new items that will revolutionize your gameplay experience. With each item carefully designed to enhance your hero's abilities, you can forge your own path, adapt your playstyle, and unleash devastating strategies upon your enemies.

name: Absorber
description: Absorber: An addictive idle RPG adventure in which you absorb the strength and abilities of defeated enemies. Explore a fantasy world, defeat challenging enemies. Immerse yourself in the unique gameplay. Will you rise to become the ultimate absorber?

name: GLASS
description: Glass is 3D, first-person psychological thriller that will lead you through an increasingly dark and volatile world in search of an enigmatic author and his mysterious, tragic past. What you uncover will change you forever.

name: Battle 3D: Zombie Edition
description: Military strategy game with zombies. Handle your units from above or handle the unit you want individually. Edit your own missions by adding units wherever you want.

name: Live Cycling Manager 2023
description: Live Cycling Manager 2023 is the ultimate cycling manager game. Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.

name: Stickman's Bad Luck
description: Enter the world of a stick man named Stickman who, reluctantly compelled by the winds of destiny, must save the land from an evil stick man named Evil Stickman! Stickman's Bad Luck is a story-rich 2D Metrovania Platformer.

name: Draconiano
description: Deliver justice viscerally, in a frenetic 3d fps old school style where every bullet counts, slide, cover and shoot don't leave anyone alive, you're judge jury and executioner

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Sports Spectacle
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Sports themed table with 2 upper playfields.

name: Renegade
description: Apple II port of Renegade.

name: Renegade
description: Port of Renegade for Thomson MO.

name: Half-Life: Source Fixed
description: As we all know, Half-Life: Source is a port of Half-Life to the source engine by Valve, and it's buggy as hell. As the source engine was updated, so was Half-Life: Source, however, those updates brought more bugs than fixed them.

name: Surgical Strike
description: Military cybernetic surgeon (a surgeon specializing in cybernetics) Sean Briston becomes humanity’s last hope as he is swept up in an interplanetary adventure in which ultimately he must personally assassinate the queen of the Dravin, a robotic alien race that has been attacking Earth for the past twenty years in an attempt to procure uranium.

name: Super Metroid: Airy
description: Super Metroid: Airy is a full hack for Super Metroid. The map has been completely changed in this patch. Also, you can shoot more rapidly with your weapon plus you will notice you can jump with the effect your body is more lighter than in a usual play through, hence the name of the title, Airy.

name: Asu Owaru Sekai, Sono Zenya
description: A very short visual novel about two sisters and their final meeting, the night before the end of the world.

name: Sega Superstars Tennis
description: Developed by Sumo Digital, this is the handheld port of Sega Superstars Tennis. While the core mechanics remain very similar, the game differs from the home console version in its presentation, depth, and certain elements of functionality.

name: Minecraft: Minecon 2016 Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Game: Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocohontos
description: Pocohontos is an unlicensed Famicom port of the Sega Genesis game Pocahontas.

name: War
description: War is an unlicensed arcade-like game made for the Famicom by Hummer Team.

name: Block Gun
description: Block Gun is a fast paced 3D Platformer speedrun oriented in which you have to infiltrate a computer system. But don't worry you have a block gun ! Use blocks to create platform to make a path to the end of each level and finish each level as quick as possible !

name: The Mask: Mayhem
description:
"Butchers" motorcycle club is known to everyone in the city, without exception.
One way or another, they creating problems for all around them. Drunken brawls, trash, loud music and bikes without mufflers.
They don't give a damn about everyone, even each other. A real pain in the ass.
From the outside, everything seems legal, it's s dive bar with stage, auto repair shop at the corner and tattoo parlor in the basement.
But behind the curtain there is a long criminal record - drug dealing, arms trafficking, auto theft, racket, tortures and murders.

this Mod is based on issue from The mask comic

name: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures
description: Design every room with your own style. Meet my BFFs and puppies! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, dancing or epic pool parties! Plus, dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! Follow us on exciting adventures in the Dreamhouse where anything is possible!

name: Suzume: Match 3 Puzzle
description: Suzume: Match 3 Puzzle is a match 3 puzzle mobile game based on the anime movie Suzume.

name: Zone 300
description: A 32 level megawad of small maps for Doom 2. Your mission is simple. Blast you way through techbases, dungeons and hellish abodes and save Earth from extinction. These maps contain no more than 300 linedefs apart from the much larger super secret level. Zone 300 = Short, quick and simple.

name: Zone 400
description: A 32 level megawad of small maps for Doom 2. Your mission is simple. Blast your way through techbases, spaceships, dungeons and hellish abodes and save Earth from a demonic pandemic. These maps contain no more than 400 linedefs apart from the much larger super secret level. Zone 400 = Short, quick and simple.

name: Meu Primeiro Laptop da Xuxa
description:
A handheld LCD educational game console that imitates the aspect of a laptop computer. It was endorsed by the Brazilian celebrity Xuxa.

Due to its low-end hardware, "Laptop da Xuxa" and "PC da Xuxa" became popular slangs for any weak computer in Brazil.

name: The Misfits Burger Joint
description: You're a security guard at The Misfits Burger Joint and you must survive until 6AM to win the game. When you see any of the misfits approaching your office, you must cover your face, or else they will get you.

name: Evolve Incremental
description: Evolve Incremental is a web-based idle game about first evolving a species from primordial ooze into a sentient species, then guiding that new species into a mighty civilization that will eventually take to the stars and colonize space.

name: Belladonna's Flight
description:
One of your peers is lying to you.
Staying hidden between fake magicians and scam artists alike, you've built your business secretly selling poison to nobles.

But with business comes dangerous fun. Now, a client has been executed, and the whole poison-selling network may be exposed. You, included.

Every path you take matters. Outsmart and seduce the others, and you may be the one to survive.

name: Minecraft: 1st Birthday Skin Pack
description: Minecraft: 1st Birthday Skin Pack was a skin pack to celebrate Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition's 1st anniversary, it was available for a limited time from May 9 until May 31, 2013, and it contained 23 different skins to choose from.

name: Minecraft: Plastic Texture Pack
description: Make your worlds simple, colorful, and vibrant!

name: DS Pico Series: Sanrio no Party Heikou! Oryouri - Oshare - Okaimono
description: A Japanese Nintendo DS Sanrio video game from the DS Pico Series.

name: DS Pico Series: Sanrio Puroland - Waku-waku Okaimono - Suteki na Oheya Otsukurimasho
description: A Japanese Nintendo DS Sanrio video game from the DS Pico Series.

name: JuJuJu Club: Potsunen
description: Available in the Story Me app.

name: Avalanche!
description: Blocks are falling from the sky. Climb them as quickly as you can to avoid the rising liquid!

name: Iteriba: Olokun's Wrath
description:
Olokun, The Orixá of the Seas and Oceans, has brought his minions and a huge wave to destroy the city of Ilê-Ifé and punish mankind. To save his people and defeat Olokun, the prince of Ilê-Ifé - Okanbi - will need all the help he can get.

Okanbi will be guided to make offerings to the Orixás with flowers and fruits, asking for their help and wisdom in this difficult moment. Some Orixás help his journey with Gifts and Blessings - powers that use the energy present in all things: the Axé. With the power of Axé and the wisdom of the Orixás, Okanbi can defeat the creatures of the deep and stop Olokun's Wrath!

name: Boys Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Infra: Underground
description: INFRA: Underground is a fan-made mod for INFRA that was released on June 13, 2022.

name: Beach Festival World Championship 1997
description: A volleyball game that features international teams of both men and women contesting in the World Beach Ball Championship.

name: Beam Invader
description: Space Invaders clone released by Teknon Kogyo in 1979.

name: Tanagram Mania
description: The most ancient puzzle known to mankind comes back in a new form on the most innovative console ever, the Nintendo DS! Play with the "seven pieces puzzle" anywhere you like, try to solve the puzzles already prepared for you, or create your own puzzles and challenge your friends to solve them! OLD GAME, NEW FUN!

name: Super Metroid: Digital Cube
description: Digital Cube is a romhack for Super Metroid, widely influenced by movies Cube/Hypercube/Cube Zero. In the movies, some people wake up trapped in a giant cube with multiples cubic rooms, with different color and numbers. Some rooms are deadly traps, like acids, spikes, sound pressure, etc. This hack is based one the same concept : 49 pain-in-arse square rooms. Good Luck to exit !

name: Super Metroid: Fear
description: This is going to be a mini/fullhack mostly resembling Searching For Items. Based mostly on exploration and finding items, which I intend to hide very well, making 100% a very hard goal to reach. But this is also to help out with mine and DSO's main hack, Fear is my platform for trying a whole bunch of odd and wacky stuff which might make it in our main project.

name: Super Metroid CRE 3
description:
It's finally time for the completion of the CRE trilogy!

Samus ends up inside of the CRE tileset, filled with janky art, for the final time.
Now with custom stuff!

name: Super Metroid: Opposition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Metroid CRE 2
description:
Samus ends up once again in a world made purely out of the CRE tileset.
Prepare once again for janky art, and have fun!

The second installment of the CRE series.

name: Super Metroid CRE
description: Sin descripción

name: Oldfartenstein 3D
description: A mod for Wolfenstein 3D that takes place 30 years after the events of the original game, where B.J. and the guards are somewhat worse for wear. Old age or not, though, they still have one last fight ahead of them!

name: Lego Harry Potter Years 5-7: Character pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lego Worlds Showcase Collection #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Parasite
description: Step into "Project Parasite," a third-person sci-fi adventure game that delivers a rich experience in a compact format. As a robot on a desolate space station, you're tasked with a mission of utmost importance - to restore a failing power plant.

name: Metroid Prime: Google Translate Edition
description: An enriched Metroid Prime 1 adventure where every bit of text in the game has been run through several languages in Google Translate and back to English. Why? Because I can.

name: Metroid: Desolation
description: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission with multiple endings.

name: Metroid FreezeFlame
description: A mod for Metroid Zero Mission

name: Metroid FreezeFlame 2: Twisted Dimensions
description: A sequel to the first FreezeFlame romhack to Metroid Zero Mission.

name: Metroid: Takeover
description: Takeover is a Metroid Zero Mission hack with layout changes, changed tilesets, sprites, and palettes.

name: Defenders of the Omniverse
description: Defenders of the Omniverse is a Reverse Bullet Hell Rogue-Lite set in a world between realities, where heroes and monsters from all across space and time face off in the final battle for the fate of the Omniverse!

name: Confession of the Golden Witch
description:
It is not advised to read this without completing Umineko no Naku Koro Ni Chiru.

Confession of the Golden Witch is a manga-only arc contained within the Twilight of the Golden Witch manga. It follows the life of Sayo Yasuda and the days leading up to the Rokkenjima massacre. Confession is also the only story wherein Sayo directly appears without any form of disguise. [Wikipedia]

This fan-adaptation of the manga chapters in a VN medium contains multiple stories: Confession of the Golden Witch, Abuse of Power, The Cage of Obligations, When the Seagulls Cry.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Nightmare
description: A romhack for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with a new challenge awaiting in the land of Hyrule. Nothing is as it seems. Items are placed in different locations and the whole world feels much darker. Can you overcome all the new dangers?

name: Last Equinox: Winds of Change
description: In this 3D isometric Roguelite, control Maeve and fight against the forces of evil that are emerging from her dimension, possessing beings to take control of her world. In each round, choose the magic of one of the 4 elements, but plan carefully because the seasons influence your attributes. Gather points, collect coins, and get ready because each round is unique and different!

name: Bloodrush: Undying Wish
description:
Bloodrush: Undying Wish is a top-down hack n' slash game with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

In this game, the player is encouraged to aggressively use their combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a deadly dance of carnage.

Focused on movement abilities, split-second decision-making, and stylish strings of attacks, the game is heavily inspired by titles such as Devil May Cry, Akane, Hyper Light Drifter, Hades, and Ultrakill.

name: C.L.T.: Cheguei Louco no Trabalho
description: Tired of dealing with endless paperwork and boring spreadsheets at work? Sign contracts and deals and get your breath ready to face another day at the office.

name: So Fart Away
description: Linguini is an aspiring food critic with a terrible tummy problem, everytime he eats something spicy he has to fart big time! Help him out solving puzzles, eating all spicy food without farting on others!

name: Wizavior
description:
Wizavior is a single-player 3D platform game with rich 2D animations, in which the player visits different planets to save their inhabitants from imminent and unknown destruction.

Inspired by arcade games that had several levels and score accumulation, the player will travel across different planets collecting and managing their current resources, being able to secure themselves with lower scores or take risks for higher scores.

In the Stages, the Player must jump on rotating platforms collecting Crystals and return to a central platform to deposit them, powering up a Spell. The Spell must be kept energized for the duration of the stage, when a Portal is opened to save the aliens on that Planet. The player will visit different planets, each with their own mechanics and peculiar inhabitants.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds: Vol. 1
description: In Volume 1 you'll get: Strea, Philia, Sinon, Silica, Asuna, LIsbeth, Dorothy, Premiere and Tia.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds: Vol. 2
description: In Volume 2 you'll get Rain, Seven, Alice, Eugeo, Leafa, ???, Medina, Kureha and Zeliska.

name: O Seresteiro
description:
In this musical adventure for all ages, the Seresteiro will go from Oiapoque to Chuí on a journey through Brazil, in search of the band that will stand up to his rival, the monster Romildo.

On his way he will face challenges and defeat enemies, spreading happiness through his singing.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash
description: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash is an action-fighting game based on the manga series Jujutsu Kaisen.

name: Matiz
description:
Matiz is a 2.5D adventure game that brings a color-driven experience, which, beyond the aesthetics, directly impacts the game mechanics, transmitting emotions in the different stages of your journey.

Get ready to enter a new universe with challenges, battles, and many mysteries. Be part of this journey to rescue the essence of colors that were lost long ago.

name: Sonho TrapStar
description: Sonho TrapStar is an action game set in São Paulo dominated by the infected of a new Covid pandemic and a fierce militia that imposes a curfew and has a license to kill anyone on the streets.

name: The Legend of Zelda: New Awakening
description: New Awakening is a full hack of Link’s Awakening featuring broad revisions to all dungeons and textual edits, overworld edits, and sequence fixes to support a new dungeon order, as well as cosmetic edits to most dungeons and parts of the overworld. The difficulty is substantially increased, with new puzzles as well as new monster encounters, but backtracking is minimal, difficult puzzles offer subtle clues (the owl statues have been updated as well), extra resources are available where needed, and the challenges do not require save states or perfect gameplay. The game is balanced for those who have played the game once or twice, but the game is playable by newcomers as well, as the hack does not throw everything at the player at once. The difficulty begins fairly moderate and gradually increases over time. Necessary information is found in the readme. The patch is made with Lunar IPS.

name: Lupin 3sei
description: Lupin 3sei (ルパン３世) is a Visual Novel video game published by Daiki. These are 4 digital manga of Lupin the Third, only released in Japan but for some reason with an English language option.

name: Grezzodue 2
description: Grezzodue 2 is an audacious blend of FPS, immersive sim and satirical horror, steeped in a rich, provocative atmosphere. Featuring one of the most expansive open-worlds based on Perugia, Italy, it promises an epic, nonlinear story with multiple outcomes. With its unique combination of ultra-violence, Italian humor, and biting social commentary, Grezzodue 2 stands for audacity, controversy, and unforgettable gaming.

name: Risen Dead
description:
Risen Dead is an Eerie Zombie PSX Styled Action Survival Singleplayer game where a nuclear winter occurred, causing the dead to awake.

You are a survivor.

name: E-Genes: Funtball
description:
E-Genes - Funtball is a game inspired in Worms and NES World Cup.

The game is turn based and you can play VS AI or Co-op with two players sharing the same mouse by turns.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Mirai 2
description:
The sequel to "Hatsune Miku and Future Stars: Project Mirai", featuring a complete overhaul of the rhythm gameplay.

An expanded version was released internationally in 2015, titled "Hatsune Miku: Project Mirai DX".

name: Eternum Ao
description:
2D MMORPG game based on Argentum Online!

In this fascinating virtual world, each player will create a character with a unique race that defines their physical appearance and a class that determines their outstanding abilities. As you progress through the game, your character will learn skills that will influence his success within the world of Eternum AO.

The choice of your race and class will be in your hands when creating your character, allowing you to forge a unique path in this adventure. Additionally, your abilities will develop throughout the game, reflecting your experience, playstyle, and personal preferences.

Interact with other players and non-player characters in this fantastical environment. Trade, negotiate, forge friendships or take on solo challenges like fishing, hunting or fighting creatures. The possibilities are endless in Eternum AO!

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Malignant
description:
Corruption has befallen Sanctuary in Season of the Malignant, the first Season of Diablo IV. A deviant form of Lilith’s sinister machinations has given birth to a new threat, Malignant Monsters.
