These decaying abominations roam Sanctuary in a frenzy, mindlessly attacking anyone in range without hesitation. Wanderers will investigate this mysterious malady in a new Questline with the help of Cormond, a former priest of the Cathedral of Light, who also trains you to capture the Malignant Hearts fueling these foul beasts and convert them into build-altering powers. The malignancy that’s taken hold of the Burning Hells’ armies cannot remain unchecked—you must snuff it out at the source before all of Sanctuary becomes its thrall.

As you hunt down Malignant Monsters for their build-enhancing Hearts and partner with Cormond to discover the source of the corruption, you’ll earn rewards from the Season Journey and Battle Pass.

The Season Journey is broken into Chapters with tasks to complete. As you progress through the Journey, you’ll earn rewards befitting Sanctuary’s defender, such as new Legendary Aspects, a Mastery Title, and a Scroll of Amnesia, which provides a free Skill Tree and Paragon Board reset. The Journey also provides Favor—the resource used to climb through the Battle Pass’ Tiers—which is also earned naturally by playing the game, whether it be killing demons, completing Quests, and more.

The Season of the Malignant Battle Pass begins on July 20, 10 a.m. PDT and hosts 90 Tiers, 27 Free Tiers and 63 Premium Tiers. Smoldering Ashes are earned from the Free Tiers, which can be spent on Season Blessings that provide you with a bonus to earning experience, Gold, or Obols depending on the Blessing you choose. The bonuses gained from Season Blessings only last until Season of the Malignant ends.

name: CatxBlock
description: Cute browser-based board strategy game for 2 or 4 players. Grab more land than your rivals. Change cute cat skins and hats, use magic, play on different maps and modes. Don't forget that CATmentator is watching you!

name: Princess Quest R
description:
A port of Princess Quest for PC.

The game was illustrated by Sugiyama Genshō. It was based on a 1996 audio drama of the same name. The game was developed by AIC Spirits and Increment P Corp.

The story is set in the Dharma Kingdom, and involves the theft of a jewel. Clues must be sought after in dungeons, castles, and towns, until the true culprit is found.

name: Mail Mole + 'Xpress Deliveries
description: Mail Mole is a charming 3D platformer featuring Molty, the fastest delivery mole, in his quest to save Carrotland from disaster! Explore magical worlds, make new friends, race against Mecha-Moles, find collectibles, solve puzzles and deliver awesomeness to the end of the world!

name: Karamu
description: Two weeks ago, Nelli sent her long-term boyfriend, Raku, the following text: "I'm breaking up with you." She has been successfully avoiding him ever since...until her bike chain breaks. He helps her, but now she's trapped in a forest with only her broken bike, a cellphone with no reception, and her slightly creepy ex-boyfriend for company. He wants to talk, and one thing is clear: he really doesn't want to break up. (He probably won't take no for an answer.)

name: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica
description: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica is a spinoff visual novel game of the original anime Eternal Boys.

name: On Air!
description: On Air! is a mobile game that puts the player in the role of an Honor Student at Hoseki Gaoka, a prestigious academy known for training top seiyuus (voice actors). Because the academy is facing bankruptcy, you’re entrusted with the task to help manage and train your fellow seiyuu schoolmates to save the school.

name: Final B Cut
description: Mobile otome game.

name: Tokyo Crazy Museum
description: Available on the "StoryMe" app.

name: Princess Quest
description: A Role-Playing game, developed and published by Pax Softonica, which was released in Japan in 1986.

name: 7th Memory
description: Otome visual novel for PC.

name: Densetsu no Kusuriya-san
description: An in-development otome game by Mix Factor.

name: Twig Quest: Little Adventure
description: Otome visual novel by Mix Factor.

name: V-Tech Rampage
description: V-Tech Rampage is a controversial amateur action video game that recreates the 2007 Virginia Tech shooting on the campus of Virginia Tech in Blacksburg, Virginia, United States.

name: Kuru Kuru Party: Princess Quest
description: A game, developed by Tomboy and published by Ides, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: 3-D Pinball
description:
A pinball video game with an isometric view. Published by Mastertronic, programmed by Steve Walters, with the Amstrad CPC conversion by Bernardin Katic of Activemagic.

While commerically released as 3-D Pinball, it is also referred to as Pinball Power in-game, across all versions.

name: Love or Money?
description: Available in the Story Me app.

name: Her Beautiful Dream
description: Available in the Story Me app.

name: Inside the Toy
description: Available in the Story Me app.

name: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest
description: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest is a video game published in 1995 on PC-98 by Naxat Soft. It's a strategy game, with adult, anime / manga, cards and fantasy themes.

name: Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest Gaiden
description:
Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest Gaiden is a Mahjong video game developed and published by Naxat Soft for the TurboGrafx-16/PC Engine System in 1995.

It is a censored port of the PC-98 game, "Mahjong Sword: Princess Quest" which was released a few months prior and the game is an off-shoot to the quirky PC-98 Board / Card RPG, "KuruKuru Party: Princess Quest"

name: Fortnite: Intrepid Engines Pack
description: She's the engineer you want for all your mechanical needs. Time to fix things on the fly with the Intrepid Engines pack. Includes an Outfit, Back Bling, Pickaxe and 600 V-Bucks.

name: Fortnite: True Colors Pack
description:
This pack includes:

- Vivi Chroma Outfit
- Scribbles Back Bling

name: Fortnite: Mainframe Break Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Ironhive
description: Ironhive is a deckbuilding strategy game about surviving in a dying world. Build your colony, ensure the survival of your people, create a legacy that will be passed on to the next generations. As the Ironlord, you are their only remaining hope.

name: Sweet No Death
description: Sweet No Death is a short horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue-heavy and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

name: Kawatare
description: Kawatare is a 3D adventure game based on the Fukushima Daiichi disaster. Taking place a month after the incident, the game provides a post-disaster scenario in which through its exploration, the player will discover more about the protagonist, the city, and its inhabitants.

name: Semiaquatic Circus
description: Semiaquatic Circus is an episodically-updating friend-sim styled VN. There is a hidden affection meter in each chapter. Gaining enough affection will allow you to successfully complete a chapter. Game takes around 10 minutes per chapter, more or less.

name: Holiday Shopping
description:
Holiday Shopping is a short winter VN. It is a somewhat-indirect-prequel to the title Cemetery Mary. It is strongly recommended you achieve the True Ending in Cemetery Mary before you play this game, in order to enjoy the full experience.

This visual novel follows the main character as they are called upon to help others during the holiday season.

name: Aliens Attack
description: Aliens Attack is an arcade shooter that lets the user defend cities from an alien armada. Collect powerful weapons to destroy the invading ships in the sky. Survive the alien assault and save the world!

name: Globs & Ghosts
description:
Save the globules colony from the deadly ghosts. You drive a nano-robot whose aim is to crunch the ghosts and their power ups, while sparing the globules.
Served by beautiful graphics, sounds and animation, this arcade game introduce a new type of gameplay that will bring you hours of fun!

name: 7,62 High Calibre + 7,62 Hard Life
description: 7,62 High Calibre is a tactical action game. A professional mercenary is in pursuit of a certain Russian "businessman", who stole a large amount of money from his "colleagues". 7,62 Hard Life is a fan made enhanced version of the original tactical sim 7,62 High Calibre.

name: Apeiron
description: Apeiron is a play-and-earn God Game x eSports hybrid that revives the classic god simulation genre from the early 2000s. Players can 'play god' by creating their own planets and controlling avatars in battle. Rule over planets teeming with adorable doods, explore dangerous dungeons, and battle other players using powerful Avatars. As a newborn god, will you choose between good and evil?

name: Wild West Undead
description: Step into the chilling world of Wild West Undead, a unique blend of Western and horror genres. Explore the cursed town of Los Diablos, face off against hordes of the undead, and uncover dark secrets. Will you uncover the truth and survive the horrors of Wild West Undead?

name: Whale Fall
description: "Whale Fall" is a single-player exploration game where you control various marine creatures to experience the magnificent cycle of life in the vast ocean.

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultra Max Edition
description:
The Starsiege Deadzone Ultimate Edition includes the Base Game, 180 days of Deadzone Premium, 6 Suit Tokens, 6 Weapon Wrap Tokens, The Blood Eagle/Diamond Sword Suits, & a cape.

Deadzone Premium grants XP bonuses, Stash Tabs, Bonus Contracts, and Safe Slots.

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultimate Edition
description: Starsiege: Deadzone - Ultimate Edition

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Starter Edition
description: Starsiege: Deadzone - Starter Edition

name: Starsiege: Deadzone - Founders Edition
description: The Starsiege Deadzone Founders Edition includes the Base Game, 90 days of Deadzone Premium, 3 Suit Tokens, & 3 Weapon Wrap Tokens. Deadzone Premium grants you XP bonuses, Stash Tabs, Bonus Contracts, and additional Safe Slots.

name: Scary and Dot
description: One gray evening, a feeling of hunger forced you to leave your cozy one-room apartment and walk to the nearest grocery store. However, it looks like it's already closed… Good thing the new diner that has opened near your house is open 24 hours a day…

name: Sakura Bunny Girls
description: An action visual novel with a splash of fanservice about a security guard who gets entangled with three mysterious, attractive, seductive bunny girls who just so happen to have superhuman powers.

name: Striker Manager 3
description: Striker Manager 3 is the best Play to Earn multiplayer football manager game that combines the fun of traditional football games with the ability to be the owner of your in-game assets. Manager, your time has come!

name: Stumble Upon Rumble
description: Retro Zelda meets Punch Out. Players use their movement to deceive their opponents and use the attacks to strike at the right time. The winner keeps on fighting while the others watch and chat. It's a real-time multiplayer game with servers of up to 30 players.

name: Team Disorder
description: Team Disorder is a Sci-Fi Action-adventure Pirate 3D video game! The main character is played in either the first or the third-person options. This game includes four Open World maps with many secret levels. All maps have hundreds of Bad Actors to address.

name: The Lamplighters League: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the exclusive Nocturne agent, a Digital Art Book highlighting the inspiration and design behind The Lamplighters League, and the full game soundtrack from award-winning composer Jon Everist. Take on the Banished Court in style!

name: The Sophisticated Art of Friendship
description: The Sophisticated Art of Friendship is a narrtive video game for PC, Mac and Linux. It last about an hour and a half and it is not a traditional video game. We break the fourth wall to bring you this extroudanry story to life.

name: The Silenct City Chapter Two
description: You have landed in the military outpost where you look for help, however when you arrived. You noticed that all of the military guards are dead. This marks the beginning of The Nightmare. Once again

name: Poetry in Purgatory
description:
Isobel Salvie seems to have everything; youth, beauty, wealth... unfortunately, none of that matters much when you're dead, poisoned by an unknown person for equally unknown reasons. Arriving in Heaven, Isobel is greeted by God herself. All seems well, because as it turns out, Paradise is wonderful.

However, the afterlife's pleasures don't come for free...

Poetry in Purgatory is a unique, ever-evolving story about what it means to live, love and make peace with things you can't run away from... even when you may desperately want to.

name: Reyna Darkness
description: A game with RPG and adventure combination. it is about the mystery that become fundamental of everything in the past. and that was Reyna's purpose, to become darkness.

name: RedNeck Bowl Games
description: Bowling Game without the bowling Ball

name: My Pet Hooligan
description: Rebel against the evil overlord Metazuckbot by wreaking havoc on Hooliland City. Fight each other, destroy stuff, skateboard like a pro-skater, graffiti the buildings, or just hang out with friends. Playing the way you want is what it means to be a Hooligan.

name: Payday 2: Crude Awakening Heist
description: Alice Rainey is on the run, she's currently hiding out at one of her business enterprises in the Gulf of Mexico. And like many have been made to learn before her, one does not simply hide from the Payday gang.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Premium Edition
description: A farmer's dream of agricultural variety: the comprehensive Premium Edition of Farming Simulator 22 contains seven content packs, two expansions (Premium & Platinum), six maps, and hundreds of authentic machines by renowned brands from all over the world.

name: Life Changer
description: Life Changer is a life simulation RPG where you can take on a solo or multiplayer path of personal development. Seek opportunities through exploration, acquire skills, education, advance your career, invest, and grow businesses to achieve life goals and realize your dream life.

name: KibaGames
description: Fast paced Multiplayer games

name: Art is Rifle
description:
Unleashing the Chaos in Shooter Puzzle Genre!

Art is Rifle is an open-world, FPS puzzle game with rhythmic bullets and psychedelic art styles. Powered by Unreal Engine 5 and much passion.

Experience a psychedelic adventure through first-of-its-kind mind altering core gameplay mechanics, beyond visual and auditory designs!

Dive into a world of puzzles where tutorials are optional, and discovery is key! Your solutions, your style. Puzzles are your canvas, solve them your way!

Weaponize your art through a symbolic journey of cultural exploration.

The whole world is your drum kit!

Immerse yourself in a visually striking game that dances with a fusion of intense colors and mind-altering, psychedelic elements.

name: Bad Rats Revenge
description: Bad Rats is a physics puzzle game where rats finally get their bloody revenge on their new prisoners: The cats. Come up with creative solutions for each puzzle using physics, functional objects, and your specially trained Rats

name: Corrupt: Political Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to be in charge as either the President or the Underworld Boss of your country?
Why not both?

Corrupt - Political Simulator is the answer you've been waiting for!

name: Cyber: Mind Dive
description: This is a game in which a beautiful girl sneaks into the spiritual world to explore the secrets of Cyber City. Players need to find the way to the truth in the layer-by-layer randomly constructed heart network world.

name: Turi: Kaapora
description: Turi: Kaapora is an isometric hack 'n' slash where you will control the guardian Caipora, with insistent and brutal enemies, discover the forest and its secrets, get all the help you can, and destroy enemy buildings so they can see who is in charge here.

name: Confronting
description: Confronting is a science fiction micro horror puzzle game produced for RPG Maker MV, with a small amount of real-time combat.

name: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery
description: Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a game which helps learners to memorize 300 basic words in Simplified Chinese, Japanese, German, French, Russian, Spanish, English or Brazilian Portuguese. Vocabulary Galaxy Orrery is a complementary casual tool that can be used as a part of a lesson.

name: The Interview
description: A very sexy story with plenty of lewd scenes and animations.

name: Stay Home
description: Stay Home is a breathtaking first-person shooter with co-op for up to four players. Get ready for fast-paced gameplay and terrifying action as hordes of zombies flock to you. You can run but you can't hide!

name: Under the Water Depths
description: Under the Water Depths is a first-person game in which you will dive into a trench in the middle of an unknown ocean. The depths of the sea hide sinister yet mystical secrets.

name: Star Charms
description: Think fast and click charms matching the color of a bouncing star. Idle away some time with this pretty and deceptively simple casual game.

name: Sands of Solaris
description: Discover the magic within the sand of solaris as you complete calm & beautiful puzzles by transporting light through a variety of solar machines.

name: Ninnin
description: "Fifty City," where ordinary people and ninjas live together. However, the city is in turmoil due to ruthless "hunter" gangs. Ninja girl "Ninnin" infiltrates a gang to save the city!!

name: Galactic Defense: Automation
description: "Galactic Defense: Automation" is a real-time strategy game that emphasizes unit behavior automation. All units run their own cycles: production, development, death, and recycling. Players design construction plans to defend and destroy enemies.

name: Donut Land Clicker
description: A casual game where you need to conquer the world with your donuts, so that everyone talks about your donuts in every nook and cranny. To build an empire, you have to curse a donut, and then on the accumulated donuts - build an empire, buy business after business, improvement after improvement.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 6
description: You fainted after defeating the fat guy and can't recall what happened. The place just looks ancient ......

name: Days End
description: Horror First-Person Short Shooting Game

name: Agent Jump
description: High speed action 2D platformer that requires strategical thinking as Agent Jump jumps all over the stage using jump pads. Kick your way through to the next level!!

name: Accelerate Zone
description: FULL-THROTTLE STG "ACCELERATE ZONE". This is an action shooting game where the faster you go, the better your strategy. It's okay to take your time and go at your own pace.

To endure the challenges ahead, you must undertake daring missions that test your survival skills. Each mission you take can be the difference between life and death.

description: The Vikings discovered America - the new world. But instead of claiming it for their own, they announce a regatta: Whoever arrives first in the new world, can keep it. name: Koisuru Oukoku
description: In a mythical age, a young man seeks to become an adult. He leaves his farm home to face the frontiers of the kingdom. He comes to a town where one can seek any apprenticeship freely. This is so one can find his own purpose in life, and perhaps his own lover as well. Jobs include: border guard, educator, various magical schools, fisher, and more. With each job there appears to be a respective woman in the same profession to charm. Will the hero be able to find and woo the girl of his choice in time for the town's festival?

name: Whole Lotta Lies
description: The game follows a pig named Pixie and her friends, who were torn away from their loving mothers as babies and are being raised on a filthy, barbaric farm. They need your help to stay away from the cruel workers, who are hell-bent on shooting sick and injured pigs and sending the rest on a terrifying trip to the slaughterhouse.

name: Lord of the Wings
description:
Ding dong, your tank is dead. To resurrect her, you accept a quest to take a duck to the neighbouring city under strict instructions to NOT open the cage.

Enjoy duck puns galore, a wealth of truly terrible jokes, and — sometimes spicy but mostly dumb — romance with the adventurer of your choosing. Customise your character, find hidden items to unlock extra choices and enjoy the comic book experience!

name: F.O.O.D.S.
description: Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and work as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!

name: Sonic Forces: Super Sonic
description:
Speed through the levels faster than Sonic... as Super Sonic! Transform into Super Sonic across 20+ Modern and Classic Sonic stages. Collect the right amount of rings and Super Sonic will spring into action, giving you the ability to sprint across stages at break-neck speeds.

Please Note: You cannot participate in the rankings with Super Sonic.

name: Rotten Apples
description: After leaving your ex-fiancé at the alter, you move towns to find a more adventurous life (hopefully filled with more romance). However, the guys who seem to be taking an interest in you seem a little… off. The new town you’re at doesn’t seem to be as safe as you thought as well…

description: Hop around obstacles while collecting ancient dust!

name: Bó Cócó Zinha
description: On a quiet planet full of ranches, a little chicken must take over the family restaurant and recover the golden recipes, which have been stolen and scattered across several worlds full of juicy enemies and spicy dangers. Face the challenges and regain the hopes of the Galo family.

name: Yume no Office
description: Get ready to step into the ultimate dating simulator and experience the thrill of love in Yume No Office. In this captivating visual novel, you take on the role of Kuta Aoyama, a young professional working in a bustling office alongside five captivating female colleagues. As you navigate your way through the daily grind, you'll have the chance to develop intimate relationships with each of the charming ladies.

name: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
description: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is an upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
description: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is the Steam release of the upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports
description:
Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports (Tiny Toon Adventures 3: Doki Doki Sports Festival in Japan), released in 1994 on the Nintendo Game Boy and developed and published by Konami, is the third Tiny Toon Adventures-related game for the system.

The player chooses either Buster Bunny or Babs Bunny and participates in their choice of sports activities, including baseball, soccer, or tennis. As Buster, they can also play carnival games set up by characters such as Shirley the Loon and Fifi La Fume. Carnival games include a watergun gallery and a beat-the-clock challenge featuring Elmyra Duff.

name: Loop Loop Room
description: Loop Loop Room is an upcoming simple puzzle platformer game filled with a variety of gimmicks.

name: Pumuckl: Fangt den Klabauter
description:
Pumuckl is a small red-haired goblin character from a popular German TV series. His major concern is to trifle with humans.

The non-violent, fun, and educational jump'n'run game with Pumuckl and the Blue Klabauter. Missed opportunities in the game can be compensated for by solving math problems.

name: ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea
description:
Welcome to "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea" a thrilling platformer that combines the charm of classic 2D gameplay with a fresh, updated style. Embark on an epic adventure through five enchanting worlds, each with its own unique biome and a climactic boss battle awaiting you at the end.

In this captivating game, you'll have the opportunity to play as different characters, each possessing their own distinct skills and statistics. Take control of the agile and graceful Angel, an expert Archer with the ability to double jump, allowing you to traverse the treacherous terrain with ease. Alternatively, you can embody the cunning Spec Ops, armed with a trusty Pistol and Grenades, granting you swift movements and a penchant for tactical warfare. If you prefer a more resilient approach, choose the Desert Soldier, equipped with a powerful Rifle and boasting higher health, albeit at a slower pace. The swift and lethal Ninja wields a deadly Katana, making lightning-fast strikes against enemies a breeze. Finally, the valiant Crusader, though slow, compensates with a sturdy shield and a mighty sword, ensuring both high health and formidable defense.

Prepare yourself for a visually stunning journey as you explore five vibrant worlds. Traverse the lush grasslands of the default world, challenge the scorching heat and unforgiving sand dunes of the desert, venture into the eerie depths of the graveyard, navigate the dense and perilous jungles, and experience the wonders of a futuristic sci-fi realm. As you progress through each world, face thrilling encounters with foes specially tailored to the environment, ensuring that every battle is a unique and exhilarating experience.

Throughout your adventure, discover power-ups and collectibles that will aid you in your quest. Gather health and mana potions to restore your vitality and magical abilities, while collecting feathers that unlock new and potent skills unique to each character. Utilize these abilities strategically to overcome challenging obstacles and decimate your adversaries.

Prepare yourself for an unforgettable journey as you dive into the immersive world of "ARIA: Angelic Realms In Arborea".

Embark on a heroic quest, test your platforming skills, and unveil the secrets hidden within each world as you bring forth the resurgence of the immortal allegiance. Are you ready to rise above the challenges and embrace your destiny?

name: Gefangen in der Drachenfestung
description: Join the PLAYMOBIL-kids Laura and Alex on an exciting trip into the world of knights. Princess Laura gets kidnapped from the evil wizard Grimmbart and captured in Dragon's Castle. Squire Alex wants to rescue her. He needs to win the knights' tournament as well as beating the dragon, other knights and the evil wizard. He needs to beat level 3 in 11 exciting minigames.

name: In Search of Immortality
description: A game made in two weeks for the Release Something Weekend.

description: Autumn Break is a mod for OMORI that takes place three days before the recital.

name: Droids: The White Witch
description: Almost no information on this game can be found online, but this is a Star Wars game for the MSX featuring top-down arcade shooting gameplay. It is based off of the Droids TV show from the 1980's, the player controls the ship featured in the show.

name: Hero's Fever Dream
description: HERO's Fever Dream is a mod that tackles the aftermath of the truth from OMORI.

name: "Omori" "Mod" Made to Appeal to "Omori" "Fans"
description: This is an Omori mod that was said to be AI generated to be appealing as possible to players.

name: Four Nights at Omori
description: Four Nights at Omori is a mod that turns the game into a FNaF-styled survival horror.

name: Star Wars: Saga Edition: Lightsaber Battle Game
description: Star Wars: Saga Edition: Lightsaber Battle Game is a plug'n'play game released in 2005, shortly after Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It lets the player use a wireless lightsaber to "defeat" enemies from the Star Wars saga. The game claims to be from the point of view of a Jedi the player names, but most of the events occurred to Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi.

name: Curtain Call Crusade
description:
Mira, a college third year transfers to a new university to pursue her passion for theater acting, eager to make a name for herself. But she has a secret: She's a magical girl that fights evil! And it seems she's not the only one when a cocky outgoing hero appears in front of her one night, and things don't end well. Meanwhile in her regular life there’s a boy in theater class that she can't seem to get along with, but he seems to be hiding something.

Engage in competitive flirty banter, create mishaps and hijinks, and uncover secrets in this funny romantic comedy otome game!

name: Pearlglow Cafe: Sweet Crumb Kisses
description:
"With every wave, a new adventure..."

Near the edges of a seaside town, where salty breezes kiss skin and a radiant sun shines on the horizon, an enchanting cafe emerges... Owned and operated by an spirited young witch, every pastry she serves has a singular purpose: to spread boundless joy and compassion throughout the world.

Enter the world of Pearlglow Cafe and guide Juniper as she embarks on a charming journey filled with new beginnings, gentle romances, and delectably magical treats!

name: Saintess Alasdair is Dead
description:
Saintess Alasdair was hailed in Filigree and the kingdoms beyond as the reincarnation of the morning Goddess. Beautiful, pious and powerful, she was forever victorious in battle and perfect in her devotion.

But now the Saintess is dead, her body scattered over the battle field like weeds after rain.

You are Gwendolyn, the Saintess’s much less impressive sister, and your marriage to the King of Assynia will fix whatever complications the Saintess left behind.

You will not fail.

name: Pilla's Paradise
description:
In the year 3227… humanity is scattered across the solar system, connected only through Lifesight.

Follow Pilla, a cute and bubbly streamer as she decides to reinvent herself with a trip of a lifetime to a planet she’s never known! What might she discover in the Last Paradise on Earth?

name: Paranoia: The Game Edition
description: Meet a new state of the famous thrilling first person shooter - PARANOIA is released now as a stand-alone game. This release is a pretty simple port of original PARANOIA mod v1.2 for Half-Life to Xash3D Engine. It allows you to play PARANOIA as a standalone game right after installing. All required resources are provided with the game, Half-Life or even Steam are not needed.

name: Family Guy: Air Griffin
description: Peter Griffin has just spent Meg's college fund on a freakin' sweet medieval catapult. Help him achieve greatness as he tries to smash the record for the world's longest unaided human flight.

name: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
description: A short, single player, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's meant to be finished in one sitting. Use the shadows, shoot out lights, stun enemies, and conceal yourself in the darkness through 5 Missions.

name: Febilis
description:
This game is a prototype version.
It has been designed for Xbox controllers but can still be played with mouse and keyboard. It features a save system you can use to save your progress and keep playing later on.

name: Delicious Quest
description: Delicious Quest is a game about a dog on his journey to find the Holy Roast Turkey. Unfortunately, this dog can't control himself and will require your help to go further in his epic quest!

name: Beat Head
description:
Unreleased Prototype from Atari Games.

Jump on the tiles that match your color or that have your color and your opponent's color. Jump on enough to fill your spaces before your opponent fills his.

name: Home Run Derby: vs Fairy Tales
description:
Intense VR Home Run Derby Game Begins Here!
The pitchers you'll face are famous characters from fairy tales. They'll throw absurd and unpredictable magic pitches. Stay in the ultimate state of concentration, the "Zone," and hit home runs with precision!

name: Top Jump
description:
Welcome to Top Jump, an exhilarating and addictive game that will test your speed, agility, and strategic thinking! Race against other players in a thrilling vertical challenge, as you strive to reach the summit of a treacherous cave and secure your position on the leaderboard. Can you conquer the heights and claim the top spot?

In Top Jump, your primary objective is to ascend the cave as quickly as possible. Leap from platform to platform, avoiding obstacles and deadly traps, all while maintaining a lightning-fast pace. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate through the ever-changing environment, filled with pitfalls and hurdles that can hinder your progress.

What sets Top Jump apart is the ability to manipulate time. In the infinite training mode, you have the power to rewind time endlessly, enabling you to perfect your strategies, explore alternative routes, and enhance your skills. However, in the competitive ranked mode, time manipulation is limited and can only be used sparingly during each run. Be strategic in deciding when to activate this feature, as every instance will cost you valuable seconds, potentially affecting your chances of climbing the leaderboard.

Are you ready to embark on the ultimate climbing challenge? Put your jumping skills to the test in Top Jump and prove that you have what it takes to reach the summit and become the reigning champion of the leaderboard!

name: More Super Mario "Bras." Beginner's Edition DS
description:
With 8 (eight) complete worlds, More Super Mario "Bras." Beginners Edition DS is a patch to add into the original New Super Mario Bros game for DS, to create a new game with new levels. Released in October/2015 for the Nintendo DS/3DS.

The game also features a customized multiplayer levels for two players. "More Super Mario Bras." was made thinking on younger and inexperienced players. However, during the development of the levels, the brazilian team decided to leave the game a little bit harder. See some drafts. This hack uses a minimum of imported tilesets. Most levels have been built with the original tilestes. The design of the levels try to enjoy and make the most of originality and creativity with the pre-existing material.

developers.name: The New Super Mario Bros. Hacking Domain

name: Christ's Revenge: Ascension
description: Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Jump, Dodge, and Glide your way to the top as Jesus Christ himself.

name: More Super Mario "Bras." 2: Choose a Path!
description:
More Super Mario Bras 2 is the continuation of the previous classic with many new features. What if you could choose the path you want to go during the game at the same level? What if you could double the amount of different levels to explore in the same game? Well, now you can. In this variant, the player will have the option to select a different path to complete each level.

With 8 (eight) complete worlds, More Super Mario "Bras." 2 - Choose a Path! is a patch to add into the original New Super Mario Bros game for DS, to create a new game with new levels. First released in February/2016 for the Nintendo DS/3DS. More Super Mario Bros ("Bras.") 2 - Choose a Path! is a free open source hack.

developers.name: The New Super Mario Bros. Hacking Domain

name: Dishonored 2: Limited Edition
description:
Reprise your role as a supernatural assassin in Dishonored 2. Play your way in a world where mysticism and industry collide. Will you choose to play as Empress Emily Kaldwin or the Royal Protector, Corvo Attano? Will you stalk your way through the game unseen, make full use of its brutal combat system, or use a blend of both? How will you combine your character’s unique set of powers, weapons and gadgets to eliminate your enemies? The story responds to your choices, leading to intriguing outcomes, as you play through each of the game’s hand-crafted missions.

The Dishonored 2 Limited Edition is a limited supply edition of the game (available by pre-ordering from specific retailers before the release date) that comes with additions. They include the following physical and digital rewards:

- A free digital copy of Dishonored: Definitive Edition, an enhanced version of the original title which includes all the DLC and features improved graphics
- Physical editions from participating retailers come with the Imperial Assassin’s Pack:
- Duelist’s Luck Bone Charm: bullet packs have an increased chance of holding one more bullet
- Void Favor Bone Charm: supernatural powers have an increased chance of consuming no mana
- Lore Book: A Musician’s Farewell
- Antique Serkonan Guitar
- 500 coins to use in black market shops

Retailer exclusives include:
- Best Buy: Dishonored comic book. (Also offers an exclusive The Royal Protector Bundle with Collectible Steelbook, Corvo Keychain and Dishonored: Corroded Man Novel)
- GameStop: a reversible mask
- Amazon: free Dishonored soundtrack

description:
Fly through a number of checkpoints into the finish line as fast as possible.

The Glider has no propulsion, the only way is down.

You can brake midair to slow down and fold in your wings to drift.

Happy Highscore Hunting.

description: Sci-fi, bloodthirsty bunnies, and the powers of a goddess at your disposal! This is Bunny Battle Nemesis. Experience intense action, explosions, and chaos as you defend the Bunny Kingdom from certain doom at the hands of a vengeful demigod and her army of mercenaries.

description: A tower climbing challenge taking influence from classic game romhacks- 32 screens of tightly packed high-stakes precision platforming, where any fall could result in a devastating domino effect that erases your progress.

name: Donald Fuck RPG
description: An obscene Disney fangame made in RPG Maker 2003

description: An RPG maker game in the style of mother 1 by swordofkings128
Detective otome game.

name: Tsubasa no Oka no Hime: A Red and Blue Moon Finite Loop
description:
An otome game by Snapdragon.

The story is set at the 19th century at the United Kingdom, in a rural town called Wingfield.

name: Fushigi no Kuni no Alice
description: Fushigi no Kuni no Alice is a Japanese video game for the Game Boy Advance, based on Lewis Carroll's classic novel "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.

name: Fushigi no Kuni no Alice
description: 3D graphics remake of Fushigi no Kuni no Alice (GBA).

name: Phobos: Anomaly Reborn
description:
Phobos: Anomaly Reborn is a PWAD level set by Christopher Lutz released in 2003. The episode features a similar design as Lutz's other levels, with highly detailed and realistic environments. Examples of such include a moving train and a hangar with ships and transport rails. The episode was included in Doomworld's Top 100 WADs of All Time list.

Thematically, the episode serves as a replacement of the first Doom episode. However, it is much more difficult than the original, with bigger puzzles and stronger enemies appearing earlier.

name: Shechu de Fubao
description: A Blessing for the Herd is a morality tale about China's "996" system of overworking employees, aimed to expose the societal and cultural structures behind the "996" system. Take control of a fledging e-commerce startup, manage investor funds and employees, and grow your customer base -- but be warned, pushing your employees to the edge can have devastating consequences. As the company expands, the stories of you and six other employees intertwine, as you work overtime to fulfil impossible investor expectations.

name: Nightmare in Squidville
description: Do you remember Squidville where Spongebob and Patrick were looking for Squidward? At the end he flew away with a reef blower. But did he? And how long have they been searching? Find it out in this Walking Simulator and explore what happened in Squidville after this episode in an alternative reality.

name: Royelles - Gaming For Girls
description: Royelles is a virtual universe created specifically for girls and non-binary individuals, where play has been redefined. Royelles game play is anchored in a collection of the fiercest female personas, that inspire you to create, connect, learn and most importantly, have FUN - by simply being yourself.

name: Drug Prince & Narcotic Girl for Nintendo Switch
description:
A Nintendo Switch version of Drug Prince and Narcotic Girl that includes the Main Story, from the first encounter with the main characters all the way up to the fake marriage chapter.

In addition to the newly written story from the boyfriend’s point of view, the Switch version also includes a new opening movie, newly drawn illustrations, and a new sensitivity feature. Also, the Side Story, which is available as an additional purchase, includes a “newlywed” themed story that was previously only available in the fan book.

name: Copycat
description:
Turn based action game.

Defeat enemies to absorb their power.

Destroy the mimic crystal to ascend.

description: Otome game included in the Story Me app.

description:
Visual novel in the Story Me app.

To win the gold medal, we jump!
The protagonist is an admirer of the world of Figure skating, where people compete on ice. One day the protagonist is led by a mysterious stone, and meets a boy and a girl who elegantly dances in the ice rink.
You all have the same goal of winning the gold medal at the Olympics. As friends, and sometimes as rivals, this is the story of figure skaters who compete in the beautiful yet cruel world of Figure Skating.

You and your sick companion, Lev, fly by what seems to be another dead planet. Or is it? You receive a transmission from this planet inviting you to land. Lev is not himself and becomes charmed, will you?

name: Synergy of Serra
description: Synergy of Serra, an upcoming free-to-play PC/MacOS deckbuilding trading card game, promises to revolutionize the card game genre by merging the collectibility of classic Trading Card Games with the infinite replayability of Deckbuilder Card Games.

He doesn't know if anyone or anything currently haunts these walls, but there is one thing he can conclude: He shouldn't have come here.

name: Skygard Arena
description: Skygard Arena is a turn-based tactical RPG with a vibrant roster of MOBA-style Heroes. Assemble your squad, equip items and abilities, and outplay your opponents in fast-paced strategic battles. Discover the world of Skygard in a multi-campaign solo adventure, or fight in thrilling PvP matches!

name: Froggy's Adventures
description: Froggy's Adventures is a game where the player plays as frog. That has to collect all of the flowers/mushrooms/pebbles/crystals on each level, while avoiding enemies.

name: Gift Quest: Valentine's Day
description: Tile matching game with Valentine's day theme.

name: Clifford the Big Red Dog: Learning Activities
description: Clifford the Big Red Dog: Learning Activities is an educational computer game based on the children's book series by Norman Bridwell.

name: Aikode
description: In Somnium, a world doomed to an endless cycle of death, Aiko, a Kyao created by "The Order", comes across a puppet that will lead her to the worst of futures - her own past.

name: Syrenka Racer
description: Syrenka Racer is a simple arcade racing game, dedicated to the memory of the Polish car Syrenka, produced between 1951-1983.

name: Hollow Knight: Pale Court
description:
The unofficial expansion mod is finally here!
Challenge Hallownest's mightiest champions in grand combat!
Overcome your opponents with powerful new charms!
Discover new secrets and stories!
All with an incredible new soundtrack!

name: Chasm
description:
Joe is a good sleeper, very good - some would say the greatest in Chasmton. But there are just some things you can't sleep through; good lovin' and bad rockfall.

Joe doesn't get much lovin these days, but rockfall has cut off his town's water supply from the dam at the top of the chasm, and you (lucky devil) have the chance to go along for the long and perilous ride.

name: Enigmatica 2: Expert
description: Enigmatica 2: Expert is an expert questing modpack for Minecraft 1.12 with over 650 quests to guide you along the way.

name: Barbarossa Remake
description: A Fantasy Top Down level based game that features around a little mage that has special abilities

name: Examination of Fear
description: Thank you for volunteering in our research! Juts answer a few questions and the job is yours!! What could go wrong?

name: Go Up!
description: In this technical first-person platformer, the objective is to get to the top in the shortest time, when you fall you may lose significant progress and feel negative emotions, this is normal.

name: DarkBase 01
description: You are all alone in this dark and foreboding military installation. Trapped and surrounded by hundreds of disturbing creatures that are all too eager to kill you, you must find a way to cancel the quarantine lockdown and escape this hellish place.

name: Show da Copa com Estádio 97
description: Show da Copa com Estádio 97 is a comedic soccer trivia game featuring the cast of the radio program Estádio 97 and questions related to the World Cup.

name: Homunculus
description: Homunculus is a short mystery point'n'click game created for Ludum Dare 52.

name: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth
description: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth is an upcoming sequel to Alien Holocaust, developed by Fernando Rodrigues Salvio and published by Bitnamic Software.

name: L00P
description: A Survival/Story game where you find take a picture of an invisible door, collect notes, and loop your mistakes.
